 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

JOIN OUR UAE CULTURE BOOTCAMP

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1997&user=10620> 	

Our Culture Bootcamp is your chance to dive into the essence of our Group’s “One Team, One Culture”. Get ready to experience our culture in action, which will equip you with diverse approaches and mindsets, enabling you to play an active role in shaping our culture evolution journey. Secure your spot now - limited spots available!
Join us on Wednesday, 24th September from 10:00 am - 2:00 pm in HO2, Atrium.
Sign up now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1997&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Make Feedback Part of Your Year-End Success

chunks.text:
Our Culture Bootcamp is your chance to dive into the essence of our Group’s “One Team, One Culture”. Get ready to experience our culture in action, which will equip you with diverse approaches and mindsets, enabling you to play an active role in shaping our culture evolution journey. Secure your spot now - limited spots available!
Join us on Wednesday, 24th September from 10:00 am - 2:00 pm in HO2, Atrium.
Sign up now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1997&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Make Feedback Part of Your Year-End Success

Feedback helps you grow, strengthen relationships, and head into your Year-End Review with confidence.

Start having feedback sessions with your manager and colleagues. You can also use DRIVE to set up and track these conversations.


Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1998&user=10620>  on how feedback can support your year-end success. 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1998&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1999&user=10620> 	

Day 6 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Day Challenge!

Nick Vinckier, VP Corporate Innovation, is sharing how innovation is not just a buzzword at the Group and how we will make the most of AI.
